sense.gloss: to tie, to bind, to link
to close (e.g. deal), to confirm, to conclude
to close tightly, to purse (e.g. lips)
to unite (with), to ally, to join hands

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑努力↑↓どりょく↓はいつかは↑実↑↓み↓を|↑結↑↓むす↓ぶ|だろう。
sdata.e: Your efforts will bear fruit someday.

sdata.e: The bridge between Denmark and Sweden is almost five miles long.

sdata.j: お↑互↑↓かたみ↓に↑恋愛↑↓れんあい↓のできないやうな↑男女↑↓だんじょ↓が、なんの↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓から↑友情↑↓ゆうじょう↓↑関係↑↓かんけい↓を|↑結↑↓むす↓ぶ|のか、↑筆者↑↓ひっしゃ↓にはさつぱりわからんのである。
sdata.e: This author doesn't understand at all what need would a man and a woman who can't be involved in a romantic relationship have of becoming friends.
